item.title: Wallpaper virtual rooms!
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Since I have an extensive collection of patterned papers, it was time to do something with them…

item.title: New biography of Franz Robert Fritz Neumann (1897-1984) aka Ric available
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description:
After the identity of Fritz Neumann and thus Ric could be clarified in October, Mark Strong from Meibohm Fine Arts compiled, condensed and published on AskArt on the basis of the findings from my blog.

Without a paid membership, the full biography can be viewed every Friday, otherwise it is also available for free at Meibohm Fine Arts.

Many thanks to Mark for his work!

item.title: Never Built Göttingen
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Who doesn’t know them, the three blue towers of the University of Göttingen,…

item.title: Projektemacher 2024
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: At the end of 2024, here is the annual retrospect for Projektemacher.org. Over 270 articles were published over the course of the year (the most active year to date).

item.title: Briefsteller.de started

item.description: Finally, the last of the blogs stared during the second Corona Lockdown is now online!

item.title: Der erste Beitrag
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description:
After the site Projektemacher.org went online in the last few months to unite my old Tumblr blogs and the projects of the first Corona Lockdown under a single

one roof as an umbrella brand, mine is now starting personal homepage.
